title: Mayoral Candidate in Louisville, Ky., Escapes Shooting at Office
sub_head: Police charge suspect with attempted murder; ‘It all happened so quickly’
body:
A Louisville, Ky., mayoral candidate narrowly escaped gunfire at his campaign office on Monday, police said.
Craig Greenberg, a Democrat, sat down in his campaign’s office for a morning meeting with staff members. He said they were busy making to-do lists for his mayoral campaign when a man walked up to the doorway of the room.
